description: {"blocks":[{"key":"8ip2k","text":" An amalgamation of cell line data in the lab. Its origin and standard culture conditions.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

parent_collections.title: Metabolic programs drive function of therapeutic NK cells in hypoxic tumor environments
A tri-specific killer engager (TriKE) against mesothelin targets NK cells towards lung cancer

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"77o7t","text":"All cells are maintained in humidified incubators at 37°C, 5% CO2, unless otherwise specified. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":64,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"ccg2k","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"8u2in","text":"All cells are routinely tested for mycoplasma infection using a PCR-based test (Universal Mycoplasma Detection Kit, ATCC Cat. No. 30-1012K)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"6rfgq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"fvf3t","text":"Dates of purchase are provided. Aliquots of purchased cells lines are frozen at P0, P1 and P2 from original stocks and P2 are defrosted and used for experimentation as standard.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3fk3h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5rhrv","text":"Cell lines confirmed by short tandem repeat analysis are marked with *.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7jckf","text":"Media for cell lines:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bejpg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"856rr","text":"R10: RPMI (Gibco Cat. No. 2240-089) + 10% fetal bovine serum (Gibco Cat. No. 26140079) + 100 U/mL Penicillin and Streptomycin (Gibco Cat. No. 15140122)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"14rhq","text":"D10: DMEM (Corning Cat. No. MT10013CV) + 10% fetal bovine serum (Gibco Cat. No. 26140079) + 100 U/mL Penicillin and Streptomycin (Gibco Cat. No. 15140122)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1jjgf","text":"D10-SP (without sodium pyruvate): DMEM (Corning Cat. No. 10-017-CV) + 10% fetal bovine serum (Gibco Cat. No. 26140079) + 100 U/mL Penicillin and Streptomycin (Gibco Cat. No. 15140122).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":32}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5frnu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2tkug","text":"Unless otherwise indicated, adherent cells are passaged using trypsin-EDTA (0.05%, Gibco Cat. No. 25300054). Some lines require 0.25% trypsin/1mM EDTA without Ca2+ Mg2+ (EMD Millipore, Cat. No. SM-2003-C), or this buffer diluted to 0.2% trypsin.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":161,"length":2},{"style":"sup","offset":166,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"icck","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5kv9v","text":"Cells transfected with plasmid are maintained with blasticidin (Thermo Fischer Scientific, Cat. No. A1113903) or puromycin (Sigma Aldrich, Cat. No. P9620-10ML).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":51,"length":11},{"style":"bold","offset":113,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

Do not allow the cell concentration to exceed 1x106 cells/mL.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":140,"length":1},{"style":"sup","offset":199,"length":1},{"style":"sup","offset":261,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ehvfi","text":"2.
